website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around inverter with enough available power to run multiple devices, such on those used on long car trips. An affordable option with enough power for numerous uses.
pros: Runs quietly and charges devices quickly without heating up
300 watts of power is suitable for typical uses of most consumers
cons: USB units stay powered, draining the battery
Cooling fan gets noisier over time

customer_reviews.title: Makes road trips easier.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We used it on a road trip and I was able to use my double electric breast pump and charge our cell phones at the same time. It does have a slight hum to it but we could barely hear it over the radio. Feels pretty heavy duty and it got bumped around a lot with no damage or dings. I'd recommend this to family and friends. Update 6 months later: Still love it, works as great as the day we got it. I leave it in the center console compartment and love we can plug in our quick charge bases and don't have to spend money on quick charge car chargers.
customer_reviews.author: B. DeKo

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to power up Christmas lights on my Corvette for the Christmas parade in our small town. The unit ran the lights and a tree mounted on the rear of the car very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: No complaints - this inverter has always worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for a laptop to charge, which I sometimes use this for when needing to charge my PC on the go while in a car. It's not super warm or loud and it's a fair priced product. I've had no issues with it in the two years I've owned it so I would definitely recommend this inverter to anyone looking for a fair-priced, well-performing inverter as long as 300W is all you need (most laptops don't need more unless you have a high-powered gaming laptop).
customer_reviews.author: C. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Brought this charger on a 9 day road trip, worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this charger on a 9 day road trip, worked like a champ! During the trip I had a laptop, tablet, and an extender with two DSLR camera batteries all pugged in at once, the BESTEK never had a problem. Very impressed by it's durability and ability to power multiple devices simultaneously. Fan is a little noisy when car is idle but you it exceeds standard road noise. Long power cable allows it to extend a a good distance from your lighter port . Great product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It still works after over a year...runs strong in my police car and aids with keeping equipment functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Donald and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A very handy gizmo
customer_reviews.text: Love that thing. I am a photographer and need to charge my camera batteries which I can't do via USB, so this thing has been a life saver for me. It is well made, and when the 110 volt converter is turned on, all you hear is a very slight humm. To recharge via USB, the converter does not need to be turned on. I placed mine on the passenger side of the center console with industrial velcro, and it functions real well there. Needless to say, the motor have to run in order for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Danwood

customer_reviews.title: Share of the power
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product in 2013. It has been working faithfully in my car ever since (5 years). Occasionally if we go in the wife's car I take it as a back up and we inevitably end up using it. I would say the only downside to this device is the noise coming from internal fan which fades into the background has the miles drift by.
customer_reviews.author: MeanDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Charges my phone super fast.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I started using this before my exchange date was up. It’s nice and compact, have a fan you can turn on to keep it cool and it really charges my cellphone fast (which is what I needed cause my car barely charges it). My kids and I can all hook our apple products up at the same time which is great instead of the “okay you’re at 25% it’s my turn”. Only complaint is the prong outlet. I can plug something in but I almost break the outlet trying to pull it back out. I don’t know why the fit is snug. I’m hoping it lasts. Would of really liked to of exchange it for another on.
customer_reviews.author: MD P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable High Performance Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, durable unit! Fantastic job at providing Real AC power from 2 AC outlets, convenient USB power plugs also on the front! No issues so far, but I haven't tried powering any device with a truly heavy current draw yet. However this unit appears to stand by it's description.
customer_reviews.author: Sono-sanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver rated power levels
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a road trip and needed a unit to power a 240W laptop running CAD sims, etc. I purchased this item specifically for its 300W rating. When laptop is shut down and plugged in, everything works fine. As soon as the laptop is powered up, the Inverter light starts to flash red, and the laptop was throwing up battery errors. The unit may claim to have 300W available, but it does not deliver that power level, even under 80% load. One positive aspect: It will power a cell phone. Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephen mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After a Few Uses
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/22: I have finally received a response from the company and they have shown that they will stand by their product by sending a replacement. Great customer service! I bought this last year and have remained in our family car since then. We've only used this whenever we go for road-trips which would probably be 3 times. 2 months ago, the electrical outlet stopped working although the USB port still works. I reached out to Bestek's customer service and just ignored my email. I thought their customer service will be better than this because of this product's high review. So far, I have been extremely disappointed with this product as well as the Bestek company.
customer_reviews.author: kire

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it really delivers 300 watts.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product and it charges things quickly through USB. Where my problem is, is when I try to hook up my TV and laptop to do tailgate streaming at football games. The TV says 110 watts and the laptop adapter says 170 watts. I even put the laptop in a lower performance mode. This results in the TV constantly shutting off or just staying off in general. The math adds up to 280 watts, so again I am not sure if this really delivers 300 watts.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Strong but has its limits
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inverter it stood up pretty well against 120 degree desert heat. It shut itself down a couple times over a 3 week period but came back after it cooled off. It wasn't till I was doing outdoor Christmas lights and tried to test a whole tree on it that it died. My fault for overloading it. Just wish it had a circuit breaker to reset rather than being trash
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all save your money and look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Pecoski

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Shorted on me and stopped working the 2 week after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Falco

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Used it on a camping trip for a mattress inflator and as an emergency option for phones, etc. (we were in the absolute middle of nowhere Northwoods bear country). Had zero problems, worked exactly as advertised. I have a feeling the people with issues were leaving it plugged in and turned on all the time - I turned it off before unplugging, only had it powered if I needed it, and kept my car running while it was in use. If it wasn't being used it stayed in the glovebox. You know, common sense stuff. I have no regrets in this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take to the lake to plug in our electric air pump for our inflatable boat. We bought it at the end of May and just tried using it for the first time last weekend. It does not work. When we plugged in the electric inflator into the socket it did not turn on. When we plugged the inflator into another electrical socket it worked, so we are 100% that the issue is with this product. Upon contacting Amazon I was told that the return window was closed. So now I’m stuck with a product that doesn’t work after having spent almost $30. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Luberger

customer_reviews.title: Update: incredible Customer Service! Have room for it, to prevent overheating!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: upgrade to 4 stars! After 18 months, the Seller offered me a replacement!! Wow, fantastic Customer Service!! My advice is to make sure you have enough room for the power inverter so there’s space around it! Otherwise, it will overheat and may stop working! This was the problem with my original inverter! Original review: It's quite large and doesn't it well into the front compartments of 2 of our family's 3 cars. The on/off button is in a rather inconvenient spot. It worked fine and noiselessly for 2 months. Then the AC outlets stopped working and all I ever used the outlet for was an electric razor. I did unplug it from the cigarette lighter outlet every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: had an issue with this 300watt unit, but customer service was great and took care of the issue!
customer_reviews.text: unit is 300 peak, 150 per outlet and as long as your aware of this it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ordered on September 18, 2014
customer_reviews.text: "Ordered on September 18, 2014" I was going through my account looking at items I had purchased. I still use this product as of today. (Friday, 29 SEP 2017) I was wondering if this product had been updated. Just curious. Does it need an update? No. I didn't realize I have had this for over 3 years now. It has worked and continues to work flawlessly. Maybe this review will help someone. It's a quality item that works and the price is decent. I have a 30w Turbo Power charger for my Moto Z force and I can charge it without issue while also using the (2) USB ports. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: Had issue with inverter, but seller issued a full refund. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time and it quit working, but seller issued a full refund. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap, fan doesn’t even work!!
customer_reviews.text: I never do reviews but I thought I would to save other people their money or time of mailing it back. I bought it hoping it would work but the fan doesn’t even come on so it will not last long and will overheat. I figured I may have got a bad one so I purchased another one to try and it had the exact same problem. They are made very cheap and will only cause frustration. I will be getting a refund on both but it’s still a waste of time. Don’t buy trust me!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after return window closed.
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite purchase ever, for about three months. I’m writing in the car as I sit between car seats with two breathing treatment nebulizers that won’t work because the power adapter completely broke or shorted out or something. Won’t work in either outlet which I know are not the problem because my cell phone charger is working fine. Basically, don’t waste your money. And now both kids won’t get their breathing treatments until we get home. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: nchottie

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this I tested it by charging my phone and it worked fine. But, I didn’t realize how weak this thing is. I recently took it camping with me and when it came time to inflate the aerobeds this thing completely shuts down. I had to drive around and borrow an inverter from fellow campers who were nice enough to lend one to a complete stranger. The inflator needs about 100 watts and this is rated “300” so I know that is total BS because it worked for 2 seconds then conked out. I wish I knew this earlier I would’ve returned this useless piece of junk. DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: They keep up with their product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in February 2018, after a month it started to make a winding noise that I’m assuming came from the fan. I had to move it around to make it quiet. Now, December 2018 it stop working completely. No fuses to change, no signs of burn cables or nothing, it just died. Warranty? Update: they contacted me and validated the warranty. I got a new one and works perfect. I have to admit they keep up with their product and customers.
customer_reviews.author: sanneti

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve needed this for a long time, but I did not know it. My wife and I have begun take long driving trips and enjoy listening to books on tape, but our van is so old it doesn’t have a built in CD player. We bought a portable CD player and used a lot of batteries. Our 5-year old grandson came with us on a trip and we needed to power his portable DVD player, as well. This worked perfectly. We could plug in both electronic devices and could keep our cellphones charged (one for GPS). It worked superbly, quietly, and discretely. I wish I had bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!! Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find this item. I have a great 1997 Toyota Tacoma pick up with 60,000 miles but, of course, no digital charging ports back then. You can't just plug your digital phone into the cigarette lighter because there is no power modulation and you will fry your phone. This device fixes that. It even has an on/off switch so that I can turn it off when not charging my phone, so that I don't run down my truck battery. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: mermaid artist

customer_reviews.title: Handy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a handy little device! We bought it for a recent camping trip where we had no access to electricity. We used it to blow up our air mattress, which took only a minute or two. We also charged 2 iPhones , a camera battery and an iPad simultaneously. These took more time to reach 50% battery life from completely drained (about an hour). We charged while driving around to avoid draining the car battery. Would definitely recommend this red charging device.
customer_reviews.author: A. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Only put out 99-100 volts
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did before using it was put a volt meter on it and it only registered 100 volts. Just to be sure, I checked the car's cigarette lighter voltage - 14.5. Tried it in another car. Same result. So it won't run things the same as the 110-120 it is supposed to (e.g. a drill will not hit top speed). Very disappointed as unit looked good. Will return and try another brand altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Mona S. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. Everytime i travel i make sure that this ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. Everytime i travel i make sure that this item is with me. I travel a lot and always had worried about my laptop, cellphones and other items loosing juice. With this power supply i have not had to worry about that concern anymore. Just make sure that you unplug it if you have an older car or turn off the switch on it or you will show up with a dead car but thats totally your fault if you do that. Great item over all. Many of my family and friends have now purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tray Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good inverter. Plenty of power to charge portables
customer_reviews.text: This “300” watt inverter won’t provide enough wattage to charge with a 110 watt charger which is less than half the rating of the inverter. This is directly plugged into battery and only one plug socket in use. The cooling fan has not turned on to date and the whole unit smelled of burnt electronics right out of the box. Contacted the company for warranty. Company sent a replacement and it works like it should. Must have gotten a bad one the first time. Supportive and fast company. I would definitely buy this inverter again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Keep it plugged in and turned on.
customer_reviews.text: It really does work fine. No complaints. However, there is a trick. I have killed several similar items that were highly rated by just putting them in the trunk and leaving them there for months. The issue is that these types of items have electrolytic capacitors. In storage, the chemically-formed oxide layer dissolves and eventually shorts, ruining the device. So, just plug it in so that it is powered whenever the engine runs. The drain is tiny. Then, when you need it, the device will work. I use mine to charge a cell phone, and occasionally to run laptops or tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Van De Walker

customer_reviews.title: DIED after ~5 Uses, BAD DESIGN!
customer_reviews.text: DIED after about 5 uses in a year. Emailed CUSTOMER SERVICE & still no response after a week. BAD DESIGN as Fuse is Soldered onto the Board!!! (crazy for an Inverter!) From outside, it “looks” like it’s well made - deceiving... UPDATE: after sending a Follow-up Email to Customer Service, they replied in a courtesy & helpful manner.
customer_reviews.author: Freida/ Brad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you work out of your car or truck
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very useful. Powers my laptop all day. The added USB charging ports keep my phone and GPS unit charged up as well. This is perfect for someone who works out of their car all day. Compact - does not take up a lot of room. I plug mine into an outlet on the back of the console and set it on the floor in the back seat. Out of the way and reachable from the front. Only downside is that it has a fan which runs a bit noisy. You'll get used to it in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: NotSmall

customer_reviews.title: Blown fuses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run a heating pad for my back and also charge my phone. It worked well for the first few months, so I bought backups for my van and truck. I finally got around to using the other 2, and they started blowing fuses, with nothing plugged in! The next time I ran it in my car (where it had been working), it blew that fuse too. Knowing that it had been working in the car, I replaced the fuse and tried again, another blown fuse.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Never worked: Update
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Upon reading my original review, Bestek reached out to me to make sure I was taken care of. Even though the 30 day return window had closed, Bestek emailed me and gave me the option of either replacing the defective item or giving my money back. Really great customer service! ------------------------------------------------------ Original review below I purchased this inverted and waited to use it until the 30 day return window had closed. It does not function as intended. The green light simply blinks and the outlets do not provide power.
customer_reviews.author: Rking

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for disabled drivers/passengers
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did without this. Initially bought it to power my Biomat infrared heating pad for long journeys. Powerful enough to handle a low-power heating device. (I can even run a miniature hot brush off it if my hair becomes a nightmare!). Also invaluable if a passenger needs nebulizer asthma medication. Make SURE you unplug it or flip switch to off when parked, as it will drain the battery very badly.
customer_reviews.author: Nynaeve Al'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't you ordered it yet?
customer_reviews.text: Sooo flippin handy. Worked great for mobile laptop use. Plenty of power, stays cool, and not an eye-sore. There's a cooling fan that is very quiet, so no additional cabin noise. Powers multiple items at once. This unit has a small footprint...size of two portable hard drives stacked. Don't even look at other inverters. This IS the one. Put it in the cart. Seriously, you don't need to decide for yourself. Doing stuff is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during a hurricane
customer_reviews.text: This was invaluable during hurricane Irma. We were without power (and A/C) for almost a week. We plugged it into our electric car and we’re able to run a couple fans during that time without having to buy gas or a generator. It’s not enough to run your refrigerator, but it made having no power at least bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Good solution in a time of need.
customer_reviews.text: When the front 12 volt outlets died on my car I needed something to keep my oxygen concentrator charging while driving. The inverter was the perfect solution: multiple AC and USB outlets plus an additional fuse in the system to guard against surges and other issues with the 12 volt car system. The unit plugs into the rear 12 volt outlet and sits (my wife created a strap) on top of the console for easy access to the plugs and the on/off switch. The oxygen unit is actually louder than the cooling fan! By the way, replacing the outlets would cost over $200; the inverter was under $40. Next day delivery was a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: lighthouse

customer_reviews.title: Not great, now it is a paper weight
customer_reviews.text: This was a great idea and well priced. We were looking for options for boat and/or car to charge devices and give us a “plug” option instead of a 12v adapter. The two USB ports were a plus. The item came quickly, is a good size, with reasonable weight (enough to feel like the components are reasonable quality) and is attractive looking. The inverter worked well initially but then died after the Amazon return window had closed. I eoujj K d have given 1 star, but the vendor reached out to me and still processed a refund. Questionable durability of the product but very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Great little inverter!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bestek 300 Watt power inverters to run our 120 VAC LED TV's in our travel trailer. To our delight they work great and with no RF noise or interference noticed. The inverter has a low no load power draw and is very efficient. Very pleased with this little inverter.
customer_reviews.author: Gordgonefishing

customer_reviews.title: Good charging, converting utility for campers / travelers
customer_reviews.text: Great tool and utility for travelers and campers. It is reliable to plug LOW WATTS electric shavers - used for 45 minutes uninterrupted, charges two electronics at same time at full charging force with ease. No noise of electricity or moving parts at all. Though, I just did blow its fuse or whatever with an 800 watt garment steamer 😭, no breakers, no reset buttons. Actually, it did blow two fuses of my car, took a good lesson. I returned the item, but I take the blame. Read the instructions and wattage capacity. It is "up" to (max) 300 😭 Do not penny pinch and expect first class, okay? 👍🤑
customer_reviews.author: Economists' best friends - A finance major, wildlife protector, and a reserved mind.

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective placement of plugs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inverter to allow my wife and I to both charge our phones using the adaptive fast chargers. The plugs are placed so close to each other that it will not allow 2 chargers to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I’ve been driving so long without a product like this. This is a life saver for laptops or heavier powered items. The product comes with a few open slots so that you get the most of it. Although I’ve never had to utilize more than one outlet or USB port at the same time, I am confident all areas would be supported. The cord is enough length but I haven’t needed to unwrap it yet. Do yourself a favor and don’t buy the single slot adapter. This product is not that large at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shameka

customer_reviews.title: take your work anywhere
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend drives my truck so I can sit in the passenger seat with a hotspot on my phone and work on my laptop. This is excellent. I'll even sit in my camp chair around the fire and have my laptop plugged in so I can keep working. I obviously dont know how to take a vacation, but I can at least work from anywhere, which is better than no vacation at all. Sometime we switch so she can work. This is the perfect product for young professionals who need to get out of town and take their work with them.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Solid construction. Works great for laptop charger.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality build. Do be warned not every car will give it enough power from the port to actually achieve 300W, but most should be able to give you the 150 or less needed for a laptop charger, which is what I use it for. Be very careful about leaving this thing running when the car isn't, as powering stuff with this can drain your batter quickly if the alternator isn't running.
customer_reviews.author: deathbyfreezeray

customer_reviews.title: Nice inverter! You wont get 300 watts through a car cig plug though.
customer_reviews.text: I think the other reviews and the item description speak for themselves. It's a nice, small inverter. However, keep in mind, this won't put out 300 watts without a circuit that can support that. A 15 or 20 amp circuit in your car (cigarette lighter plug) won't provide the unit with enough power to produce 300 watts. (V x A = W)
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: It worked well enough.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well enough. I would honestly rate it between 3.5 to 4 stars. I was able to plug my phone into the USB and my 2-n-1 laptop into the 120V outlet. It was slow charging my laptop but all things considered, it did do the job. For the price, I can't complain and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly as advertised. I received what I ordered; no surprises !
customer_reviews.text: This INVERTER is exactly what I ordered. I wish I would have ordered the next size larger now - but that is not the fault of anyone but me. The unit performs exactly as expected. I gave it a 5 star on power because it delivers what it said it would. A couple more amps of power would be nice but as I said above I received what I ordered. I thought the power cord was a little short (strictly a personal preference) so I ordered a power extension cord to give me 10 foot instead of 24 or 27 inches, (about 2 foot). Overall very happy; I received what I ordered and it arrived on-time. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great inverter!
customer_reviews.text: So I waited a while to write my review as I wanted to put this product to use for a couple months to make sure it worked and wouldn't break. I use this product daily and this inverter has never let me down. It hasn't broke (I've had this issue with inverters in the past - they work for a short while then quit). My hubby (who is an electrician) also borrowed this to use in our fleet vehicles to charge our cordless power tools when he's on a jobsite. great product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome.... 1. Powerful enough for what I needed it for. 2. Small enough to fit in my center console. 3. The USB ports are an added bonus for sure! 4. Quiet! Unless I have my car on "accessory" and have everything else turned off, I can't hear it at all. 5. Cord with cigarette lighter plug is just long enough that I can get it to my window to plug things in from outside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for a 2000 mile road trip where I would have to use a medela pump for about 30 mins every 3 to 4 hours. I didnt have any problems with it over heating, but I also brought it inside the hotels when we stopped and used it while car was running ac. This was great for what I needed it for. Hope this helps others. For any mother that pumps, this is a good buy if you want to have more freedom from an electrical outlet. I'm able to go further for longer with out worrying about not being able to pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: But this!
customer_reviews.text: Cord length is great. Not too short and not too long. I bought this to do breathing treatments in the car while traveling using a nebulizer machine. Works great. Just make sure the car is on. I have also used it to do my treatments when the power was out from PGE while in my driveway. Just turned on the car and kept in park the whole time (40ish minutes). Can plug in a laptop and charges it. Ended up buying 2 bc I lost it when I moved and it’s been so helpful! I’ve recommended it to many people and they love it too!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Hardy

customer_reviews.title: took care of the customer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months but now shorts out any vehicle you plug it into It took a minute but the company exchanged it with a working one. Would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: FlyTrue7

customer_reviews.title: Love it worth every penny !!
customer_reviews.text: I Love every thing about this inverter , the size how quite it is and how awesome it works , my AC in my van is weak so I decided to add a fan in my van and tell you what it works perfectly!!! Yup have a fan and both my devices always charging , saved me from being way to hot and has enough power to charge my devices , if your considering a inverter for the right price this is the one you won’t be disappointed, if they send some mounting brackets or double stick tape would be cool to but I’m not complaining
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Martinez Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Performance and Noise Level
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the other reviews about noise level, I was a tad nervous to buy this product, but I decided for the price it was worth the chance. I use a deep cycle battery to provide power to my CPAP machine when we are off the grid. I was looking for something compact and quiet, but powerful enough to run my CPAP machine. This fit the bill perfectly! The only sound I hear is the white noise created by my machine. When testing it with out my machine the noise level was minimal. Great product would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Chosa

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time's a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a couple of years ago and couldn't get it to work with an air mattress pump. Maybe it wasn't strong enough for that or maybe we just got a fluke that didn't work. I returned that one without hassle and then ended up giving it a second chance and bought a new one... This time it worked exactly as expected. Was able to use a medela breast pump and also to charge an ipod nano via the usb (yes, I still have an old one...). Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E

customer_reviews.title: A Great DC/AC Inverter
customer_reviews.text: out of the box, this inverter allows me to drive a droid turbo, tablet, and laptop while the car is running of in park idling. I does not heat up and actually charges the devices when may car is running. With the high recharging cables I purchased, the devices charge back up quickly to 100%, even if they are starting at say 23%. Maybe 45 minutes to go from 23% to 100% In my world, the product is an excellent choice. In your world, the item may perform just like it does for me, but I have only used it on my Prius, and F250 Ford Powerstroke.
customer_reviews.author: p51dmustang

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not for a shared 12v circuit.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to view the output waveform, but running a 70W TV with this and every time something else on the circuit in the RV turns on the light on the inverter turns red and it has to be power cycled. Returning. The company offered me a free unit or full credit to give this a 5 start rating, but I cannot be bribed to lie.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Williams

customer_reviews.title: For emergency or utility use in the car.
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to fit in the cars storage cubby. Electrical rating is high enough to be useful for most applications.
customer_reviews.author: homertoeclipper

customer_reviews.title: I used the first time and it worked great but when I turned my car on the second ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the first time and it worked great but when I turned my car on the second time it started smoking and smelling like fire. The fan had died and was overheating it. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, in a pinch it converts your power, plugged in a blow dryer and air mattress. It couldn’t handle them both at the same time but one at a time was not a problem... Thanks Bestek...
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great in the back of a minivan for electronics
customer_reviews.text: Great for putting into the back of a minivan. We ran a extension cord from this to the backseat so the kids could plug in their electronics. Worked fantastically for long trips. Couldn’t hear it at all and it didn’t get heated up to any degree noticeable. We did stick it with epoxy to the side wall of the minivan to keep it out of the way of the suitcases and etc. Worked great and still does. Exactly what we needed and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: D Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Great product but died on me 7 months later after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this inverter about 7 months ago and it has worked marvelously for the past 7 months but then it died on me all of a sudden while I was trying to charge my phone. I work on an ambulance so this inverter had been amazing for me to warmup my meals with my hot plate and to charge my phone with. I really like the product but I hate it died within 7 months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Aramon Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips / camping
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm for a recent camper van trip where I had to charge a bunch of batteries and devices using the vehicle's cigarette lighter. Note that in order for the DC plugs to work you have to power-on the inverter (the switch is on the back). Once you do an internal fan will kick on and make a little bit of noise, but the hum of the car completely drowned it out. Had no problem using this in the car or flying with it packed in my checked luggage. It's also surprisingly lightweight. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ToddDominey

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and then some...
customer_reviews.text: I own a onerous 3t which has a turbo charge function via wall charger or their car charger. It's been about 2 months and the car charger has not be available. I started thinking and come to conclusion a DC inverter would be the solution. At around the same price of the car charger, this has done its job and then some. With the 2 outlets and USB charging outlets the whole family can charge their devices while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica20aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for a spring break trip so we had some good charging options on a 15hr road trip. I was very impressed, the fan doesn't seem to ever kick on. Maybe it is super quit or it doesn't get hot enough to warrant the fan. Regardless, I was charging 2 ipads and phones with ease. Now I use it for work and charge my hot spot and computer nearly every day. The cord length is nice to situate things as you see fit. A+
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Combs

customer_reviews.title: after 2 years of hard work... gave out
customer_reviews.text: was great for the time it worked.. but now i am left without this feature in my car. i did use it harder than most people will because i plugged a laptop into it for long periods of time. it worked great and then it didn't work at all... so yeah its like most tech items... casual use is great hard use... expect a shorter life cycle than you anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Inverter for a way of the Cross Good Friday precession walk for my church, I had to power 3 shure wireless microphone receivers a small behringer Mixer and a casio keyboard ...the night before the percession I called friends to see who had a backup inverter because I knew this one would fail and I would look like a moron in front of 1500 people ( btw my PA speaker Anchor Audio had it's own 6 hour battery ) One friend had a Jensen 300 watt inverter that I did not have to use ....because this Bestek was unbelievable...... it worked perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S

customer_reviews.title: Overall well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Works great charging my phone, laptop, and Bluetooth headphones at the same time. When using the USB ports you don't need to have the fan on at all (a switch activates it). When using the 3 prong outlets you must or power won't be provided. The unit has always stayed cool to the touch for me. There is a higher pitched hum with the fan going but I didn't find it anything to worry over. Overall well worth the money and even more so if you take a lot of road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had borrowed a similar Bestek Power Inverter from my son when my husband and I took a car trip. Loved it so much that as soon as I got home I ordered a smaller one for me. This one works just like the bigger one, but is more compact. I highly recommend it if you have trouble keeping your phone charged with the USB port in your car (if you have one). I haven't tried to use it to charge a laptop yet, because I really don't have the need. This is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Some electronics don't work, some do, it's a crapshoot
customer_reviews.text: It's a mystery as to which electronics work and which don't when plugged into this thing. Phone charger plugs worked and a portable DVD player worked, but a light set, an air pump, and a radio did not. At this point, I'll probably return it because I'd prefer to be confident that my inverter can actually power what I need to power.
customer_reviews.author: G. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: I used to order these for my workers from Northern Tool Supply for double the price and they shorted out well before they reached a year old. I ordered a few of these and they are still going strong and were half the price. Highly recommend. They are affordable and seem to be made much better than the expensive ones I was previously buying. These are built to last. We are running laptops off of them and none have shorted out yet.
customer_reviews.author: APoston2506

customer_reviews.title: I was charging phones and camera as well as actively ...
customer_reviews.text: I was charging phones and camera as well as actively running a small lap top computer all simultaneously for well over a full hour on my Jeep... and the inverter was barely warm to the touch ...I'm impressed...the unit runs quietly and efficiently...If you keep your loads at or below the 300 watt rating for this inverter ...you should have no troubles...even my full sized lap top only draws 60 to 80 watts and the draw on the vehicle battery is almost negligible..I suspect you could operate for several hours in the field with out worrying about running down your vehicle battery ...
customer_reviews.author: Monty H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later still working no noise, smell, nor issue's.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years later still working! No noise can be heard from it. Works flawlessly looks nice & has no smell nor has it caused any problems. It shuts of when I shut of my vehicle. Unless you have a fuse running your cigarette lighter constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

customer_reviews.title: These either work magnificently, or are worthless
customer_reviews.text: This would have been my third charger of this same type, the other two were magnificent. This, was not one, and it was so bad they did not ship it. My review is based on the two I have, and how well they worked for me and my crew. I would recommend getting one with amazon, because if you get a good one, you will love it. If not, well, send it back, and play the game till you get one !
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Worked great on long car ride vacation trip. My kids used this in the back seat. They used it to run a laptop, an iPad, and a phone at the same time. We turned it off and unplugged it (from the car's only 12v socket in the back seat) when we stopped and turned off the car (I was worried about draining the car battery). I did not think the fan was noisy. I makes some sound, but at least you know it is working. The sound was not distracting. It kept the kids from fighting over a single charging point. Plus, we needed the 110v plug for the laptop. I am very happy that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Rumzi

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for 2 years and 4 months then stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazing. Charged power banks, laptops, gaming devices, etc. I was even able to use my Dremel rotary tool on 2 different occasions. The reason I gave it 3 star is because after 2 years and 4 months it began it’s downfall. First both USB charger stopped working at the same time. A week later the outlets stopped working. My brother bought the 150W inverter (same brand) so we’ll see if his has a similar life span. Was it amazing while it worked? YES
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Best Inverter!
customer_reviews.text: This little unit is solid, high quality! Performs well above my expectations. Silent, and powerfull enough to charge two USB devices + two low wattage (laptop, etc.) devices simultaneously. Am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: mushroomeater

customer_reviews.title: 5 years, still working great.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my boat for around 5 years. Still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife Happy life!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her Shiatsu therapeutic massager. We took our vacation to Michigan and we would be in the car for awhile. I purchased this unit because it was a 300w device and could handle the power requirements of the massager as well charge and power 2 usb's. I drive she gets the massage. Happy wife, happy life!!
customer_reviews.author: Round Lake Tom

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Great Product, Heavy Durable, Reliable, and quality Build
customer_reviews.text: QUICK REVIEW: 5/5 Quality Build, A little heavy but feels very durable, never fails on you, no overheating has an internal fan, overall great product DETAILED REVIEW: Durability: I have dropped this a few times and it is very durable and the build is of high quality Weight: it feels very heavy, but it's not an issue since you won't be holding it while it's doing it's job Packaging: packaging was very well protected Quality: I have had other power inverters and this one seems of a higher quality build compared to the plastic ones Other Pros: has usb and regular standard plugs, has a fan for better cooling Other Cons: I hate the color red
customer_reviews.author: Pak

customer_reviews.title: This device literally melted 2 phones and a dashcam
customer_reviews.text: I lost 2 phones and a dashcam due to this product. The first incident occurred with my phone which became so hot it burned my hand when I picked it up and realized the plastic had literally melted on the phone. It was entirely fried. Unfortunately, I mistakenly thought it was the cord I was using. BUT months later the same thing happened to my dashcam and another phone at the same time. Both ruined. I was using a different cord at the time because the first cord was burned to a crisp.
customer_reviews.author: ray ray

customer_reviews.title: Know your wattage
customer_reviews.text: edited response: We needed this product for a road trip and it didn't work. Company reached out and apologized for that and sent a replacement. For the money this is a good product, it is small. Make sure to pay attention to how much power your device needs, when this product shorts it stops working all together. They will make it right however, which is the reason the improved score from my original.
customer_reviews.author: Carl McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips
customer_reviews.text: Went camping at a site with no electrical and the first night fired up the generator to charge all the devices. The next day was spent driving around the area and just plugged this into the car and charged all devices on the go. It was really convenient and worked perfectly. Seems very well made and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Necessity for Road Trips with Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this thing for months when we were planning to drive to CA but then our trip was canceled. This past weekend we drove to Chicago for 14 hours and even though all of the electronics were fully charged, they all died a 1/4 of the way into our trip so I knew on our way back home that I had to get this thing. I bought it while in Chicago and it came the next day and it was such a lifesaver when it came to drive back home. If you're planning a long distance drive, especially with kids, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: LJsquared

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this on a four day car trip. Unfortunately I pulled a muscle in my back and I wanted to take my heating pad. I ordered it and it came in time for my trip. I have to say that it powered my heating pad the whole trip without any issues. There wasn't any overheating or loud noises from the fan. The cord length is fine and the size of the inverter is just right to fit on my center console. So far I'm happy with my purchase and I would recommend it to others. I never give any products 5 stars because nothing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Les

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much from this. Figured it'd get very hot and wouldn't work long-term. I was wrong (on both accounts). Wife and I went on a road-trip from S.Florida to central Ohio w/ a 22 month old in a car-seat. I attached this thing to the cigarette adapter and it powered my surface tablet (loaded up with movies) the entire time with no difficulties (never even got warm to the touch). Kept him occupied 99% of the time on the road. That is priceless. Even kept our phones fully charged along the way (there's only one "charge" port in the car so the extra USB ports on this thing came in handy!) I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to see and works wonders. I do wish the power cord was at least a foot longer. If not six feet longer. I believe it’s enough for most people though. I’ve seen some reviews complaining of fan noise, but I had to shut off my vehicle and put it next to my ear to hear anything at all. I would definitely buy again if I lose or break this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A necessary purchase for frequent road travelers
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I never knew what a power inverter was. This inverter is simply incredible. I always hated how we only had cigarette lighter ports in the car. Now most cars have USB ports but few have regular outlets still. This inverter features a power switch with green light indicating on, 2 regular power outlets, and 2 USB ports. We took it with us to Iceland and used it extensively ALL DAY. It was charging 2 iPhones, a wifi hotspot, 3 drone batteries, drone remote controller all at the same time. And we felt that it charged so fast. It didn't get hot either because it has a built in cooling fan. Simply incredible.
customer_reviews.author: SPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I love the item. It is great if you're looking to charge your computer or any other electronic device while you're on the go. Car chargers or plugs doesnt have enough wattage for my electronic devices sometimes and this item makes that happen. As info, the item I received was defective, the cooling fan was not working so I returned it. However, I go out to photograph the landscapes sometimes and I need a stable charging unit. This item dis that for me. Instead of purchasing a bunch of car charger plugs, just get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: The power cord makes it very useful when I drive a Dodge/Chrysler mini van where the ...
customer_reviews.text: The inverter works quite well for what I bought it for. The power cord makes it very useful when I drive a Dodge/Chrysler mini van where the power sockets are mounted quite close to the floor. The fan noise of the inverter is not excessive. I have now used it for about 6 weeks to power laptops, tablets, electric shavers, an old Snappy Heater, and numerous cell phones. Overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Promising
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it, however my electronic savvy son was so thrilled with it, he bought one for himself. He has used it and LOVED it. Downside, it is a tad difficult to put in my laptop case. My son has assured me it is much smaller than many with the same feature. I'm taking his word for all of this because the man knows of what he speaks.
customer_reviews.author: kay3k

customer_reviews.title: Product will damage your vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. We bought it for a camping trip where we knew we wouldn’t have electricity. We plugged it in to the first vehicle, and it blew a fuse. I thought I did something wrong, so we tried the other ports...and in three different vehicles. It blew a fuse every time!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for powering a battery trickle charger and lighting in a remote location
customer_reviews.text: The 12V storage battery in landscape maintenance equipment parked in an equipment shed away from any AC outlet would occasionally run down enough so that the starter wouldn't operate. In the same shed, lighting was needed to let maintenance personnel see in the hours before sunrise. The Bestek inverter allowed a battery trickle charger and LED strip lights to be operated from a 12V storage battery kept 'topped off' by a solar system on the roof of the building.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Still works, but quite noisy.  Dropped from 5 to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: This device has gotten steadily more noisy over time. It is no longer quiet. I would not purchase this over again...not because it doesn't work or anything, but more because there are better charging options that are quieter these days. OLD REVIEW: Quiet and perfect for our car. We have used this for laptops (kids watching movies in the back seat), and for various mobile devices. It charges quickly and is very quiet, even when the fan is running. This does exactly what it said it does, and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: cc mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the correct inverter for electronics.
customer_reviews.text: This excellent inverter is an entirely new and advanced class of technology designed to power electronics. We use this exceptional inverter powered by an 18 amp hour sealed gel battery to run our classes right in the repair shop on live repair-ordered vehicles (customer waiting), so it has to perfectly power the scanner, the printer, the large 18" monitor and the CVCC Power supply (all if them simultaneously!) in the back hatch area of our '14 Chevrolet Volt. Dan Petit Petit Technical College
customer_reviews.author: Educator

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is a bit loud and can get annoying when sitting quietly in the car. I've only used the 110V outlets and they have worked great. I did notice my phone's touches being erractic a couple of times while charging and connected to the 110V port with a Samsung OEM charger but haven't noticed it again. Wish the cable was 1'-2' longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time well packaged. I live in area where every year we have to deal with lots of storms and hurricane threats. Many times we lose electricity for hours which is why I decided to order a power inverter. So far it has performed great and does what it supposed too. Happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: k132
